Package main

Class Score

java.lang.Object
main.Score
public class Score extends Object
Keeps track of the player score and battles won or lost.
Author:
Farzad and Daniel

    • addScore

      public void addScore(int amount) throws InvalidValueException
      Add to the value of dayScore and totalScore based on the given value
      Parameters:
      amount - the value to add to the score
      Throws:
      InvalidValueException - if given value is less than 0
